description:
This course teach you how to build your first online course and set your path toward earning your first stream of passive income. At the end of this course, you will have all you need to build your own course and make your first money online in recurring passive income.

There is over 3 hours of video tutorial separated in small video so you can easily go back and watch the video you need when you need it.

The course should be watch over a period of a few weeks but It can also be watch all at once for people that want to learn it all now.

You will learn:

-How to find your niche idea for your course.

-Step by step process to identify what your target markets wants.

-How to validate and pre-sell your course before creating it.

-How to create your course site.

-How to sell and launch your course with a boom!

-The 5 step formula to put your course on auto-pilot so it brings in money even while you sleep.
title: How to create and profit from an online course
